text: companies today need to simply and
securely collect store and analyze their
data at a massive scale
but today's fragment of data storage
portfolios force businesses to struggle
with complexity and slow down innovation
that's why AWS storage services give you
a place to store all of your data with
unmatched durability availability and
scalability with a reliable
infrastructure tools for compliance
security and Storage Management a
massive ecosystem of integrated
third-party software and systems
integrator partners and that works with
your business processes and even
enhances those processes by allowing
anyone to securely run queries of their
data without moving it to a separate
analytics platform Amazon simple storage
service or s3 lets you collect store and
analyze data in any amount from anywhere
first durability with the largest global
cloud infrastructure Amazon s3 was built
from the ground up to deliver 11 nines
of durability s3 standard s3 standard
infrequent access and Amazon glacier
storage classes store all of your data
redundantly across three availability
zones that are separated by miles on
separate power substations and connected
to other Easy's and the internet on
multiple physically separate fibre paths
keeping data written to a single AWS
region protected even in the event of an
entire availability zone loss s3 1 zone
ia gives you the option to store
reproducible data in a single AWS
availability zone trading lower fault
tolerance for lower cost and with all of
these storage classes you have the
ability to replicate that data to any
other AWS region second security and
compliance features s3 supports three
different forms of encryption and offer
sophisticated integration with tools
like AWS cloud trail for auditing it's
integrated with Amazon may see a machine
learning service that can automatically
discover classify and protect sensitive
data and it supports the security
standards and compliant certifications
the
help satisfy compliance requirements for
virtually every regulatory agency highly
regulated organizations like Capital One
say they can operate more securely in
the AWS cloud than in their own data
centers third management Amazon s3 gives
storage administrators the most flexible
set of storage management and
administration capabilities for
classifying reporting inventory and
analyzing data this means you can
understand what data you have make the
best decisions about it and
automatically keep your costs down
[Music]
Amazon s3 also works with AWS lambda so
you can develop workflows without adding
dedicated computing resources next query
in place Amazon s3 lets you run
sophisticated big data analytics on your
data without requiring you to extract
and move the data to a separate
analytics platform
anyone who knows sequel can use Amazon
Athena to analyze vast amounts of
unstructured data in Amazon s3 on-demand
and with Amazon redshift spectrum you
can run analytics against exabytes of
data in s3 and run queries that span
both the data you have in s3 and in your
redshift data warehouses and now you can
even query data directly in Amazon
glacier making archive data useful
without requiring a restore these query
and place tools make it simple for
anyone to use simple sequel commands
against your entire data set and even
when application data increases
automatic scaling means performance
stays fast and finally the partner
network in addition to integration with
most AWS services the Amazon s3
ecosystem includes tens of thousands of
consulting systems integrator and
independent software vendor partners
with more joining every month the AWS
marketplace offers software
pre-configured to deploy on the AWS
cloud this means customers can easily
use Amazon s3 with popular solutions for
backup and restore archiving disaster
recovery data lakes and many more no
other cloud provider has more partners
with pre integrated solutions
Amazon s3 is the single place for
whatever data your business needs to
store manage and analyze start your AWS
journey today at aws.amazon.com / s3
